message: Let's be realistic, Alice. Time is literally money in this game, and it's depreciating faster for you. Take this offer while it's still good!
You may think time is on your side, but I'm not desperate yet!
Okay, Alice, let's be reasonable. I've adjusted my offer to reflect the time pressure, but this is as low as I'm willing to go.  Don't let pride cost you a decent share!
Pride has nothing to do with it, I'm just not intimidated. Yet.
